1 #include "ackermann_ekf/sensor.h"
2 #include "ackermann_ekf/ackermann_ekf.h"

4 namespace ackermann_ekf {
5 
6 Sensor::Sensor(SensorArray &sensor_array, const XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue &params)
7  : sensor_array_(sensor_array) {
8  // Parse mask vector
9  if (params.hasMember("mask")) {
10  XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue mask = params["mask"];
11  ROS_ASSERT(mask.getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeArray);
12  ROS_ASSERT(mask.size() == MEASUREMENT_SIZE);
13  for (int i = 0; i < MEASUREMENT_SIZE; i++) {
14  measurement_.mask[i] = static_cast<bool>(mask[i]);
15  }
16  } else {
17  // All measurement components are fused into filter. Sensors extending
18  // this class are then expexted to remove components from the mask which
19  // cannot physically be measured by that sensor
20  for (int i = 0; i < MEASUREMENT_SIZE; i++) {
21  measurement_.mask[i] = true;
22  }
23  }
24 
25  if (params.hasMember("gravity")) {
26  measurement_.gravity = static_cast<double>(params["gravity"]);
27  }
28 }
29 
30 void Sensor::set_sensor_position(
31  const geometry_msgs::TransformStamped &transform) {
32  measurement_.sensor_position(0) = transform.transform.translation.x;
33  measurement_.sensor_position(1) = transform.transform.translation.y;
34  measurement_.sensor_position(2) = transform.transform.translation.z;
35 }
36 
37 } // namespace ackermann_ekf
